name: Chrome Shift
author: Douglas Mayle
description: Simple tab mover for tiling environments like sway

detach-tab.description: Detach the current tab into a new window

attach-left.description: Attach the highlighted tabs to the next window closest on the left

attach-right.description: Attach the highlighted tabs to the next window closest on the right

attach-up.description: Attach the highlighted tabs to the next window closest above

attach-down.description: Attach the highlighted tabs to the next window closest below
